name: Stardust Boots
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom pathetically.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'stun'.
Stardust boots are a holy artifact of the goddess Kirvana.
Stardust boots cause the wearer to randomly kick in combat.
Stardust boots allow the wearer to 'warp'
